post_message: JUST IN: Lelisa Desisa has won the men's race at The Boston Marathon in an unofficial time of 2 hours, 9 minutes, 17 seconds. It's the second victory for the Ethiopian, who won the marathon in 2013 just hours before the attacks. @webpagelink
